alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 08 at 3:14AM CDT until April 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM CDT this evening. A Fire Weather Watch has also been issued. This Fire Weather Watch is in effect from Saturday afternoon through early Saturday evening. * TIMING...Afternoon through early evening today and Saturday. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph today. Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph on Saturday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Middle to upper 60s today. Middle to upper 80s on Saturday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
